Save the Internet Act of 2019 📡

Mar 12, 2019

  • civictech
  • episode
  • policy
  • net neutrality

Ryan takes us on a quick dive back into the world of Net Neutrality. We’ll discuss the Save the Internet Act of 2019 and what it intends to accomplish.
